# Software

This is a preliminary list of software handbooks to start with:

- [R Introduction](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-intro.pdf)
- [R For Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/introduction.html)
- [Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/packages/)
- [Magrittr](https://magrittr.tidyverse.org)
- [Lubridate](https://lubridate.tidyverse.org)
- [R Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com)
- [R6 Classes](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/r6.html)
- [Command Line](https://github.com/jlevy/the-art-of-command-line)
